title: How to Make Noodle Casserole

steps.headline: Add the bouillon, dried parsley, onion and pepper to a small mixing bowl.
Store in a labeled airtight container up to 6 months.
Makes enough noodle mix to make 3 batches total.
steps.description: Use 1/3 cup noodle mix for each batch of pasta.

steps.headline: Add the egg noodles to a greased 1 quart baking dish.
Add boiling water and 5 teaspoons Noodle Seasoning Mix.
Cover and bake 5 minutes longer or until the egg noodles are tender.

text: Making the Mix Add the bouillon, dried parsley, onion and pepper to a small mixing bowl. Mix to combine. Store in a labeled airtight container up to 6 months.  Makes enough noodle mix to make 3 batches total. Use 1/3 cup noodle mix for each batch of pasta. Making the Casserole Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Add the egg noodles to a greased 1 quart baking dish.  Dot with butter.  Add boiling water and 5 teaspoons Noodle Seasoning Mix.  Cover and bake 15 minutes.  Remove cover and stir pasta.  Cover and bake 5 minutes longer or until the egg noodles are tender.  Let stand 5 minutes before serving.  Finished.
